articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Antarctica bombshell: Mars mineral found trapped in polar ice can link Earth to Red Planet - Daily Express
articles.description: ANTARCTICA researchers boring into the icy continent have stumbled upon particles of jarosite - a mineral so rare it is more likely to be found on Mars. Scientists now believe the discovery could draw a link between the Earth and Red Planet.
